nodes.text: The Fleet Command referred to the command section of the Resistance fleet. During the attack on the Resistance fleet, the fleet command staff was redistributed among three ships. Vice Admiral Resdox took command of the Nebulon-C escort frigate Anodyne and Vice Admiral Amilyn Holdo retained command of her ship, the Free Virgillia-class Bunkerbuster Ninka.
During the attack, several Resistance leaders including Holdo, Gial Ackbar and Idrosen Gawat died.
